% (v/v) Tween: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c2nor","text":"0,1 ml Tween protocol_references: {"blocks":[{"key":"5th27","text":"Vogel HJ. A convenient growth medium for Neurospora crassa (Medium N). Microbial genetics bulletin 1956; (13):42–3.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":41,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dqli3","text":"Inoculate a 5.5 cm Petri dish containing 10 to 15 ml of solid VMM with D. sapinea with an agar plug with mycelia from a preculture on VMM.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3edj5","text":"Incubate the plate for 21 d at 26 to 29°C with constant light (cold daylight at an intensity of 5000 to 650 lux). Pycnidia will form on the surface of the culture and open to release a droplet of liquid containing spores.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e23qs","text":"Harvest the spores from the plate by adding approximately 2 ml of 0.01% (v/v) Tween to the surface and rinse the surface of the colony several times by pipetting. Repeat the procedure for a higher yield. Typically, between 1x106 and 2x106 spores can be harvested per plate. Spores can be separated from the liquid by centrifugation for 10 s at 5000 rpm and then resuspended in your desired volume.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":227,"length":1},{"style":"sup","offset":237,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6hjlk","text":"For storage, mix 500 µl of the spore suspension and 500 µl 40% glycerol in a 2 ml screw top tube or cryovial. Freeze the glycerol stock tube at -80°C. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Protocol for the production and storage of Diplodia sapinea pycnidiospores
